thread.title_full: Tesco shoppers filmed jostling and shoving one another to get bargains

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson
title: Tesco shoppers filmed jostling and shoving one another to get bargains
text:
Casual day in Tesco @TheLADbibleGrp @Tesco #chaos #mental #reduced #crazy #cheap #bargainhunter @ebargainhunter pic.twitter.com/XLtD0jsm8c 
— Ryan Anthony (@ryananthonyyy) March 5, 2017 

A group of shoppers have been filmed jostling and shoving one another out of the way to get to bargains in the reduced fridge at Tesco.
They appeared to descend on a shop worker as he wheeled out cut-price fruit and veg at a branch of the shop.
Ryan Anthony, who filmed it, said: ‘Tesco’s going off in the reduced section. Tesco’s going off. The old people are loving it.’
A woman with him can be heard saying: ‘Jesus! Oh my god! All we wanted was some sausages.’
One of the men who took part in the frenzy emerged with lots of grapes. He said: ‘Think of the money you save. We save fortunes. It’s the Koreans that are the worse ones.’
